title: Drawing, "Architectural Interior Elements; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18
title_raw: Architectural Interior Elements; Verso: Anatomical Studies
medium: Pen and ink over traces of graphite on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 175, 1020, 1 Logia di carte geografiche; 2 con vedute delle principali cittá; 3 comparti delle volte ornati al uso di Raffaello, 4 quadri nel socolo li pesci nel mare più belli.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three studies of ceilings with grotesques; five studies of moldings; study of partition with statue; perspective view with standing figure. On verso: five anatomical studies of feet and toes.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Architectural Interior Elements; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18. Pen and ink over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2302.
